import React from 'react' import ListOfGifs from '../../components/ListOfGifs' import Spinner from '../../components/Spinner' import {useGifs} from '../../hooks/useGifs' function SearchResults( {params} ) { const { keyword } = params const { loading, gifs} = useGifs({ keyword}) return <> {loading ? :<>

{decodeURI(keyword)}

} } export default SearchResults
